data.meta_site_name: Bhutanese Canadian Association of Windsor & Essex  County -
data.text:
We are delighted to announce that the Bhutanese Canadian Association of Windsor and Essex County (BCA), in collaboration with Aankura Sahitya Chautari, is organizing a grand celebration of Bhanu Jayanti. Mark your calendars for this auspicious occasion, taking place on July 09, 2023, at Nepali Palace from 11 AM to 3:30 PM.

Bhanu Jayanti is a significant event that honors the birth anniversary of the esteemed Nepali poet, Bhanubhakta Acharya, who is revered as the “Adikavi” (the first poet) of the Nepali language. This celebration pays tribute to his invaluable contributions to Nepali literature and his enduring legacy.

Join us at Nepali Palace as we immerse ourselves in a cultural extravaganza, celebrating the life and works of Bhanubhakta Acharya. The event promises to be a vibrant blend of poetry recitations, musical performances, engaging speeches, and captivating cultural displays.

From 11 AM to 3:30 PM, immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of Nepali culture and literature. Delight in the captivating recitations of Bhanubhakta Acharya’s iconic poems, which continue to resonate with people across generations. Experience the magic of traditional Nepali music and dance performances that showcase the cultural heritage of Nepal.

Throughout the event, esteemed speakers will offer insightful speeches, shedding light on the literary contributions of Bhanubhakta Acharya and his enduring influence on Nepali literature. Their words will inspire and deepen our appreciation for the beauty and significance of the Nepali language and its rich literary traditions.

We invite all members of the community, literature enthusiasts, and those interested in Nepali culture to come and be a part of this special celebration. Let us come together to honor the legacy of Bhanubhakta Acharya and celebrate the power of literature and language to unite and inspire us.

The event will be hosted at the enchanting Nepali Palace, providing a warm and inviting ambiance for the celebration. Enjoy the company of fellow attendees, indulge in traditional Nepali delicacies, and immerse yourself in the cultural festivities that will leave lasting memories.

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to Aankura Sahitya Chautari for their collaboration and support in organizing this event. Their dedication to promoting Nepali literature and culture has been instrumental in making this celebration possible.
